input.sentences: today i draw masterpieces ! this is [male] the ghost | my first work .
my second work is my self right eye portrait . do you like it ?
then i drew a bird coming out of the flames .
the bird made me want to draw a man ! so i did . this is [male] the naked top tree climber .
he inspired me to draw a colored tree wasting away in the sun . i eventually got tired and fell asleep .
output.sentences: My friend thought the drawing of the male ghost was a masterpiece.
I preferred the sketch portrait of the eye.
We both enjoyed how the artist drew the bird looking like it was coming out of the flames
We also both giggled at the picture of the half naked man in the tree top.
The lone tree picture looked like a good place to rest if you were tired or just wasting time.
